name: 力學（一）
description: 本課程提供物理系大學部理論力學一般的題材。
goals: 培養學生物理的歸納及推演能力
訓練學生解析的計算能力
令學生了解力學的發展歷史
使學生注意最新的發展
syllabus:
We will follow closely the topics outlined in " Classical Dynamics of Particles and Systems "  by Marion and Thornton.

Specifically, the topics covered for each week is as follows.  

​

Week 1: Matrix, Vector Calculus and Ordinary Differential Equation.  
Weeks 2 and 3: Matrix, Vector Calculus and Ordinary Differential Equation (cont).  
Week 3: Newtonian Mechanics: Newton's laws of motion of a single particle.  
Week 4: Newtonian Mechanics: Work, Energy, and Momentum of a single particle.  
Week 5: Simple Harmonics Oscillator.  
Week 6: Simple Harmonics Oscillator (cont).  
Weeks 7 and 8: Simple Pendulum and Brief on Nonlinear Dynamics and Chaos.

Week 9: Gravitation.  
Weeks 10 and 11: Calculus of Variations.

Weeks 12, 13 and 14: Hamilton's principle --> Lagrangian and Hamiltonian dynamics.   
Weeks 15 and 16: Coupled Oscillations.

Remaining weeks: Introduction to Programming.
